version_description:
V380 Pro new features:
1.added support for cloud storage service;
2.added support for device alias;
3.added support for voice prompt switch(on/off);
4.enhanced performance of settings;
5.bug fixed and stability improvements.

Upgrades in this version:
1. Added V-Coin payment for cloud storage service;
2. Added support to change display mode;
3. Added new feature of scanning QR code;
4. Bugs fixed and great performance enhancements.
